verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aa nagara punaadi entho drudhamainadi Sthiramai kadalani sasvatamainadi (2) Prabhuve thana vaarin stiraparachuchunnadu adbhutam Adbhutam adbhutanagaram{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pavitra janulu tanatho vasinturu Evarini prabhuvu raktamuto koneno Jayavantule achchata cheruduru Vijayulai vijayulai athyantha vijayulai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ivi maanavulaku graahyamu kaanivi Prabhuni aathmeeya janule grahinturu Aathmaye bodinchun aatma sangatulan Aathmiyam aathmiyam anniyu aathmiyam{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aanagara sthithi aathmake graahyam Yesu prabhuve aa ruchini choopinchenu Pai nunna vaatini nilachi chootumu Anandam anandam paraloka anandam{/lang-eng}
